verses.verse: These be the words <S%H1697><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, in the plain <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the Red <S%H5489><s%> sea, between Paran <S%H6290><s%>, and Tophel <S%H8603><s%>, and Laban <S%H3837><s%>, and Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and Dizahab <S%H1774><s%>. the Red: or, Zuph
( There are eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey from Horeb <S%H2722><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%>.)

And it came to pass in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according unto all that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had given him in commandment <S%H6680><s%> unto them;

After <S%H310><s%> he had slain <S%H5221><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Astaroth <S%H6252><s%> in Edrei <S%H154><s%>:

On this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, began <S%H2974><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to declare <S%H874><s%> this law <S%H8451><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto us in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> long enough <S%H7227><s%> in this mount <S%H2022><s%>:

Turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and take your journey <S%H5265><s%>, and go <S%H935><s%> to the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and unto all the places nigh <S%H7934><s%> thereunto, in the plain <S%H6160><s%>, in the hills <S%H2022><s%>, and in the vale <S%H8219><s%>, and in the south <S%H5045><s%>, and by the sea <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H2348><s%>, to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and unto Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, unto the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>. all: Heb. all his neighbours

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>, Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them. set: Heb. given
And I spake <S%H559><s%> unto you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> you myself alone <S%H905><s%>:

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> you, and, behold, ye are this day <S%H3117><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

(The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> make you a thousand <S%H505><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> so many more as <S%H3254><s%> ye are, and bless <S%H1288><s%> you, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> you!)
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself alone bear <S%H5375><s%> your cumbrance <S%H2960><s%>, and your burden <S%H4853><s%>, and your strife <S%H7379><s%>?

Take <S%H3051><s%> you wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%>, and known <S%H3045><s%> among your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and I will make <S%H7760><s%> them rulers <S%H7218><s%> over you. Take: Heb. Give
And ye answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and said <S%H559><s%>, The thing <S%H1697><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> for us to do <S%H6213><s%>.

So I took <S%H3947><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and known <S%H3045><s%>, and made <S%H5414><s%> them heads <S%H7218><s%> over you, captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands <S%H505><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> over hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> over fifties <S%H2572><s%>, and captains <S%H8269><s%> over tens <S%H6235><s%>, and officers <S%H7860><s%> among your tribes <S%H7626><s%>. made: Heb. gave

And I charged <S%H6680><s%> your judges <S%H8199><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the causes between your brethren <S%H251><s%>, and judge <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%> between every man <S%H376><s%> and his brother <S%H251><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is with him.

Ye shall not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>; but ye shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the small <S%H6996><s%> as well as the great <S%H1419><s%>; ye shall not be afraid <S%H1481><s%> of the face <S%H6440><s%> of man <S%H376><s%>; for the judgment <S%H4941><s%> is God's <S%H430><s%>: and the cause <S%H1697><s%> that is too hard <S%H7185><s%> for you, bring <S%H7126><s%> it unto me, and I will hear <S%H8085><s%> it. respect: Heb. acknowledge faces
And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time <S%H6256><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> which ye should do <S%H6213><s%>.

And when we departed <S%H5265><s%> from Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, we went through <S%H3212><s%> all that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, which ye saw <S%H7200><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us; and we came <S%H935><s%> to Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto you, Ye are come <S%H935><s%> unto the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> unto us.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath set <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: go up <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> it, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto thee; fear <S%H3372><s%> not, neither be discouraged <S%H2865><s%>.

And ye came near <S%H7126><s%> unto me every one of you, and said <S%H559><s%>, We will send <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H582><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, and they shall search us out <S%H2658><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and bring <S%H7725><s%> us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> by what way <S%H1870><s%> we must go up <S%H5927><s%>, and into what cities <S%H5892><s%> we shall come <S%H935><s%>.

And the saying <S%H1697><s%> pleased me well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%>: and I took <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of you, one <S%H259><s%> of a tribe <S%H376><s%> <S%H7626><s%>:
And they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and searched it out <S%H7270><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> in their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brought it down <S%H3381><s%> unto us, and brought <S%H7725><s%> us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, It is a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> us.
Notwithstanding ye would <S%H14><s%> not go up <S%H5927><s%>, but rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>:

And ye murmured <S%H7279><s%> in your tents <S%H168><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hated <S%H8135><s%> us, he hath brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, to destroy <S%H8045><s%> us.

Whither shall we go up <S%H5927><s%>? our brethren <S%H251><s%> have discouraged <S%H4549><s%> our heart <S%H3824><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The people <S%H5971><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> and taller <S%H7311><s%> than we; the cities <S%H5892><s%> are great <S%H1419><s%> and walled up <S%H1219><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and moreover we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> there. discouraged: Heb. melted
Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto you, Dread <S%H6206><s%> not, neither be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which goeth <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, he shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you, according to all that he did <S%H6213><s%> for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>;

And in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, where thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> how that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> bare <S%H5375><s%> thee, as a man <S%H376><s%> doth bear <S%H5375><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, in all the way <S%H1870><s%> that ye went <S%H1980><s%>, until ye came <S%H935><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%>.
Yet in this thing <S%H1697><s%> ye did not believe <S%H539><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>,

Who went <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, to search you out <S%H8446><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> to pitch your tents <S%H2583><s%> in, in fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, to shew <S%H7200><s%> you by what way <S%H1870><s%> ye should go <S%H3212><s%>, and in a cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%>, and was wroth <S%H7107><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Surely there shall not one <S%H376><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, which I sware <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>,

Save <S%H2108><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>; he shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and to him will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath trodden upon <S%H1869><s%>, and to his children <S%H1121><s%>, because he hath wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. wholly: Heb. fulfilled to go after
Also the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes <S%H1558><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thou also shalt not go <S%H935><s%> in thither <S%H8033><s%>.

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, which standeth <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, he shall go in <S%H935><s%> thither: encourage <S%H2388><s%> him: for he shall cause Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%> it.

Moreover your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, which ye said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey <S%H957><s%>, and your children <S%H1121><s%>, which in that day <S%H3117><s%> had no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> between good <S%H2896><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>, they shall go in <S%H935><s%> thither, and unto them will I give <S%H5414><s%> it, and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it.
But as for you, turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and take your journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Then ye answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto me, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, we will go up <S%H5927><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%>, according to all that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us. And when ye had girded <S%H2296><s%> on every man <S%H376><s%> his weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, ye were ready <S%H1951><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Go not up <S%H5927><s%>, neither fight <S%H3898><s%>; for I am not among <S%H7130><s%> you; lest ye be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

So I spake <S%H1696><s%> unto you; and ye would not hear <S%H8085><s%>, but rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and went <S%H5927><s%> presumptuously <S%H2102><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%>. went: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up

And the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that mountain <S%H2022><s%>, came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> you, and chased <S%H7291><s%> you, as bees <S%H1682><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, and destroyed <S%H3807><s%> you in Seir <S%H8165><s%>, even unto Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.

And ye returned <S%H7725><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> would not hearken <S%H8085><s%> to your voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor give ear <S%H238><s%> unto you.
So ye abode <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, according unto the days <S%H3117><s%> that ye abode <S%H3427><s%> there.
